data: For a woman who is known HIV positive
If/when enrolled in research study, then send cord gases and collect maternal and cord blood samples for research at delivery
If/when in research study, then send placenta to pathology and flag
Confirm that intravenous zidovudine has been discontinued

Resume antiretroviral therapy. Refer to best possible medication history and medication reconciliation, prenatal records, patient's own medication supply or call Oak Tree Clinic (604-875-2250) for medication list
If patient received single-dose nevirapine in labour, select lamiVUDine-zidovudine (COMBIVIR EQUIV)
1 tab, PO, BID, order duration: 7 day, drug form: tab

Confirm documentation of informed consent discussion and patient agreement for cabergoline in chart. Formal consent is not required. Contraindicated if ergot hypersensitivity, hypertensive or using antihypertensives, pulmonary or cardiac fibrotic disorder, cardiac valvulopathy
1 mg, PO, once, drug form: tab
ergonovine contraindicated in patients with HIV on protease inhibitors
If postpartum hemorrhage then avoid use of ergots (ergonovine maleate) unless last resort
Contact Oak Tree Clinic 604-875-2250 (leave message after hours)
